TopicTitle: A.I. Kerbals in EVA AND IVA

Articles.Content: Hello, I'm new to the forums I don't know if I'm putting this in the right Place but anyways, I have a suggestion for Kerbal Charachters. I suggest that all windows become clear so that it is easier to see inside. I also suggest that Kerbals should be  re-textured for IVA so it seems more like they are living in the station and not just in a chair. For EVA I suggest that if you put a Kerbal on EVA it will stay within 5 meters of of the craft and preform EVA Activites free of charge to EVA Propellant. The reasons I suggest this are that it would make the station seem more alive and less dead. Finally I think that lights for habitable modules would be great. (Such as Labs, hitchhiker quarters, capsules, etc) I know their are mods for this but these do exclude console players which will be able to play again with the January Release. Please leave your opinions below so that the SQUAD staff can see this.

This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions & Development. 

Also, welcome to the forum.

Some Kerbal AI could be nice, but it would have to be something that you could switch on/off on a per Kerbal basis. It would be really annoying if they just started wandering about after a period of idle time, ie if you've got a group of Kerbals waiting in place so you can move a large object with KIS and one of them just wanders off. but on the other hand if you could set instructions, like hold relative position to a specific part or another Kerbal, then that would make some KIS construction easier.
